# [TYPE](SCOPE): DESCRIPTION #[ISSUE]
#
# TYPE: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci, build, revert
# SCOPE: client, server, core, api, ui, cli, docs, deps, config, etc.
#
# Examples:
# feat(client): add support for streaming responses #123
# fix(core): resolve message storage race condition #456
# docs(api): update authentication guide #789
# refactor(ui): improve dashboard performance
# chore(deps): update dependencies to latest versions
#
# Write your commit message above this line.
# The first line is the subject line (required)
# Leave a blank line before the body if you want to add more details
#
# Body (optional):
# - Explain what and why vs. how
# - Reference issues and pull requests
# - Include breaking changes if any
#
# Footer (optional):
# BREAKING CHANGE: description of breaking change
# Closes #123
# Fixes #456
